game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you must embark on a journey to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient kings. Gather clues, solve puzzles, and overcome challenges to reach the final destination where the treasure is hidden.

task.description: Your first task is to locate the hidden map that will guide you to the treasure. The map is said to be hidden within the forgotten ruins of an ancient temple.
Once you have obtained the map, you must decipher its ancient symbols and markings to reveal the true location of the treasure. Be prepared for a brain-teasing challenge!
The map leads you to a remote and mysterious island. You must set sail and navigate through treacherous waters to reach the island safely.
The treasure is heavily guarded by mythical creatures that inhabit the island. You must defeat or outsmart them to proceed further towards the treasure.
After overcoming the challenges of the island, you will need to solve a series of riddles and puzzles to uncover the precise location of the hidden treasure.
Finally, you have reached the treasure chamber. Your ultimate task is to retrieve the valuable ancient artifact and the pile of gold coins that lie within. Congratulations!
